publication_name.ja: 福井大学工学部研究報告

paper_title.en: Resonant tunneling transmission characteristics and tunneling time in asymmetrical double-barrier structures with multiple prewells

description.en: Resonant tunneling phenomenon in the asymmetrical double-barrier structures with multiple prewells is studied theoretically. First, analytical expressions for the tunneling transmission coefficient and the resonance condition are derived. Second, analytical expressions for the dwell time and for the shortest dwell time condition are obtained. It is found that the dwell time in the main well region decreases greatly with increasing number of prewells, and that there exists an optimum number of prewells which makes the dwell time in the whole region shortest.

publication_name.en: JAPANESE JOURNAL OF APPLIED PHYSICS PART 1-REGULAR PAPERS BRIEF COMMUNICATIONS & REVIEW PAPERS

paper_title.ja: 外部井戸を有する対称三重障壁構造における共鳴トンネル特性
paper_title.en: Resonant Tunneling Characteristics in Symmetrical Triple-Barrier Structures with Outer Well

description.ja: We propose "novel symmetrical triple-barrier structures with outer wells" and analyze theoretically tunneling characteristics for this structure. First, analytical expressions of the transmission coefficient and the resonance condition have been derived. Next, we have examined numerically tunneling time which is related to device operation speed. It is found that outer well can control tunneling time and that the proposed structures would be useful for designing high speed tunneling device.
description.en: We propose "novel symmetrical triple-barrier structures with outer wells" and analyze theoretically tunneling characteristics for this structure. First, analytical expressions of the transmission coefficient and the resonance condition have been derived. Next, we have examined numerically tunneling time which is related to device operation speed. It is found that outer well can control tunneling time and that the proposed structures would be useful for designing high speed tunneling device.

publication_name.ja: 電子情報通信学会論文誌

paper_title.en: A new technique for measuring the distribution of charge-to-mass ratio for toner particles with on-line use

description.en: In this paper, we show a technique for measuring the value of Sigma(q/m) by using a newly developed apparatus in which charged toner particles are transported above the sheet of periodic array conductors driven by four-phase rectangular pulses. At the end of the flow path of toner particles in the transportation system, parallel electrodes are set up for sensing Sigma(q/m). The sensed input signal is amplified by differential amplifier and is converted to digital values. By analyzing the sensed signal, the value of Sigma(q/m) for the charged toner particles can be calculated. This technique can measure easily the value of Sigma(q/m) for the toner particles and its distribution with on-line use. We obtain the experimental result that the distribution of Sigma(q/m) shows a good coincidence with the result of the E-Spart method near the peak range.
